QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_FootingBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Base quantities that are common to the definition of all occurrences of footings.

QtoDef.Name: Length
QtoDef.Definition: Length of the footing, not taking into account any cut-out's or other processing features. For strip footings it is measured along the path, for other footings it is one of the horizontal dimensions. It should only be provided, if it is constant.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: Gesamte Länge des Fundaments, bei Streifenfundamenten entlang der Mittellinie. Sonst eine der beiden horizontalen Abmessungen. Der Wert wird nur angegeben, wenn die Länge konstant ist.

QtoDef.Name: Width
QtoDef.Definition: Total nominal width (or thickness) of the footing. For strip footings it is measured perpendicular to the footing path (or longitudial axis). For other footings it is one of the horizontal dimensions. It should only be provided, if it is constant.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: Gesamte Dicke des Fundaments, bei Streifenfundamenten horizontal senkrecht der Mittellinie. Sonst eine der beiden horizontalen Abmessungen. Der Wert wird nur angegeben, wenn die Dicke konstant ist.

QtoDef.Name: Height
QtoDef.Definition: Total nominal height of the footing. It should only be provided, if it is constant.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: Höhe des Fundaments. Der Wert wird nur angegeben, wenn die Höhe konstant ist.

QtoDef.Name: CrossSectionArea
QtoDef.Definition: Total area of the cross section (or profile) of the footing.

QtoDef.Name: OuterSurfaceArea
QtoDef.Definition: Total area of the extruded surfaces of the footing (not taking into account the end cap areas), normally generated as perimeter * length.

QtoDef.Name: GrossSurfaceArea
QtoDef.Definition: Total area of the footing, normally generated as perimeter * length + 2 * cross section area. It is the sum of OuterSurfaceArea + (2 x CrossSectionArea) and shall only be given, if the OuterSurfaceArea and CrossSectionArea cannot be established separately.

QtoDef.Name: GrossVolume
QtoDef.Definition: Total gross volume of the footing, not taking into account possible processing features (cut-out's, etc.) or openings and recesses.

QtoDef.Name: NetVolume
QtoDef.Definition: Total net volume of the footing, taking into account possible processing features (cut-out's, etc.) or openings and recesses.

QtoDef.Name: GrossWeight
QtoDef.Definition: Total gross weight of the footing without add-on parts, not taking into account possible processing features (cut-out's, etc.) or openings and recesses.

QtoDef.Name: NetWeight
QtoDef.Definition: Total net weight of the footing without add-on parts, taking into account possible processing features (cut-out's, etc.) or openings and recesses.
